name: Remote Job Listings
special_instructions: The 'tag' filter is used to search for job listings related to a specific technology or skill (e.g., 'java', 'node', etc.).
The 'maxNumberOfListings' filter is used to limit the number of results. Higher limits will take longer to scrape.
The 'maxConcurrency' option defines how many pages can be processed by the scraper in parallel. The scraper automatically increases and decreases concurrency based on available system resources.
The 'debugLog' option, when set to true, shows additional debugging information.
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
